title: Pot Roast
steps: Season roast generously. Brown in oil on all sides, 10-12 minutes. Transfer out.
Cook onion, carrots, celery until soft, 8 minutes. Add garlic, 30 seconds.
Add wine, scrape up bits. Reduce by half.
Add broth, tomatoes, bay leaves, thyme. Return roast.
Cover, braise at 300Â°F until fork-tender, 3-3.5 hours.
Slice against grain. Serve with strained sauce and vegetables.
